summary: This is an email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers to attorneys Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Mennin er, transmitting a Daubert opinion and order in the case United States v. Maxwell (20cr330). The document indicates the opinion will be docketed the following day.

events.title: Daubert Opinion Issued
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issues an opinion and order on Daubert motions in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email transmitting a Daubert opinion from Judge Alison J. Nathan in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (docket 20cr330).
The opinion was issued on November 11, 2021, and was scheduled to be docketed on November 12, 2021.
The recipients are attorneys Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Mennin er, indicating they are counsel of record in the case.
The attached document (20cr330_Daubert_Opinion_11.11.212s.pdf) is a key legal ruling on the admissibility of expert testimony in Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.
